Packages that use ValidateException
Package
Description
com.epam.facultative.model.dao
Package containing interfaces to implement Add new implementation as sub package here Implement CategoryDao, CourseDao, StudentDao,TeacherDao and UserDAO.
com.epam.facultative.model.dao.impl_sql
Package containing DAO implementation and constants for MySQL database.

Package containing Services.
com.epam.facultative.model.service.implementation
Package containing concrete Services.

Package containing util to validate fields.
